txt.en: You have shoo'd away each cat in Furtherholm's harbour. You should report to Maghôrdo at Furtherholm's harbour, near the waterfall.
Many stray cats have made the Furtherholm harbour their home, and you think they should go.
Shoo the scruffy cat
Shoo the skinny cat
The scruffy cat hisses and scampers away
Shoo the slinky cat
The skinny cat protests before running away
Shoo the smelly cat
The slinky cat complains and slinks away

'You think the cats should go? I hate to admit it, but I think you are correct. It would be for the best. The Captain charged me with making this island as agreeable as possible for visitors, and if visitors object to the cats then it is my duty to see them gone.

'Just shooing them away from the harbour would do. [placeholder], I do not wish to do this thing myself. If you do this in my stead, I will compensate you.'

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
Maghôrdo has asked you to visit each cat in Furtherholm's harbour area and shoo them away.
The smelly cat hisses and scurries off
Shoo the sleepy cat
Talk to TBD
The sleepy cat growls at you and dashes away
Shoo the sassy cat
Completed Cat Conundrum: No to Cats
The sassy cat hisses at you and slowly walks away, tail held high
Return to Maghôrdo
TBD
Cat Conundrum: No to Cats
